response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you today. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects the significant value the product holds for both of us, while also allowing me to achieve my goal of maximizing the return on this valuable asset. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance and presents an excellent chance for you to secure this item at a premium price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
